citations.narrative:
There were no sale records present for rabbits sold since September 12, 2024. Failure to keep and maintain records of all
rabbits sold makes it difficult to track animals and document changes in ownership. Sale records must include: the name
and address of the buyer, date of purchase, species name, and the number of rabbits in the shipment. Licensee must
keep and maintain records of all rabbits sold. Correct by November 7, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.75(b)(1) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
There were no sale records present for rabbits sold since September 12, 2024. Failure to keep and maintain records of all 
rabbits sold makes it difficult to track animals and document changes in ownership. Sale records must include: the name 
and address of the buyer, date of purchase, species name, and the number of rabbits in the shipment. Licensee must 
keep and maintain records of all rabbits sold. Correct by November 7, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
